Tabs

Tabs buttons and tabs content may be anywhere in the dom, you don't need to collect them in one dom element. It is an analog of button plugin with data-type="radio".

$(document).find("[data-toggle='tabs']").tabs()

Properties

Name Default Description
toggle @$btn.data('toggle') or 'tabs' To find all tab buttons in the DOM and initialize them.
target @$btn.data('target') or null Selector to find the content of that tab button.
group none String. Name of the tabs group. Uses to deactivate other tabs in the group, when one tab was activated.
event "click" This event will be used to activate/deactivate button.
active 0 Number of the tab to activate after initialization.

Methods

Inside each method to get tab use @ or this in js. Class instance always stores in data attribute of the tab element @data('kit-tab') or this.data('kit-tab') in js.
Method Default Description
beforeactive undefined

Set a function to call it before activate tab. If it returns deferred.promise(), then tab will not activate till deferred.resolve(), and woun't activate at all if deferred.reject(). You can just get data with $.ajax() instead of using deferred.

$('.btn-with-before').tabs
	beforeactive: ->
		d = $.Deferred()
		@find('a').html 'Loading...'
		@addClass '_disabled_'
		setTimeout ->
			d.resolve()
		,2000
		d.promise()
	
	onactive: ->
		@removeClass '_disabled_'
		@find('a').html 'Checked'

	onunactive: ->
		@find('a').html 'Checkbox'

onactive undefined

Set a function to call it after tab activation.
beforeactive undefined

Call this function before deactivate tab.
onunactivate undefined

Call this function after deactivate tab.
